name: Feature-to-regulation map
output: A mapping from features to regulatory perimeters and required controls (geo-gating, counsel review, redesign).

name: Launch matrix by jurisdiction
output: Allowed / Restricted / Counsel-required / Do-not-launch matrix for features and distribution channels.

name: Partner strategy reality-check
output: Partner list with confirmed support posture toward privacy assets (where known).

name: Policy monitoring loop
output: Watchlist updates and tier changes (with rationale and sources).

name: Release gate (lightweight)
output: Release approval record (what changed, what jurisdictions affected, any geo-gates updated).
